description.value: A set of codes that define the intended use of a record within the Organisation Data Services (ODS). Full records are complete, whereas skeleton/partial records are provided for reference use only. Record use type is distinct from Status and Record Class. For more information see: [ODS Reference Data Catalogue](https://odsdatasearchandexport.dc4h.link/referenceDataCatalogue/index.html).

definition.value: A complete record of an ODS entity
Skeletal record, maintained for referential integrity purpose only
